info.name: Sapphire Save Session & Generate Notes API
info.description: Postman collection for Sapphire Session Management API - Save session data and generate AI notes

request.description: Login to get JWT access and refresh tokens. The access token will be automatically saved to environment variables.

item.name: Save Session Data and Generate Notes (Full Example)

exec: console.log("Warning: No access token found. Please run Login request first.");

request.description:
Complete example with all fields:
- **auto_save**: Automatically save generated AI notes to session
- **pre_session**: Array of checklist items (array format)
- **activities**: Array of activity objects with name, duration, description, response
- **goals**: Array of goal objects with goal, target, trials, successes, percentage, notes
- **abc_events**: Array of ABC events with time, antecedent, behavior, consequence, notes
- **reinforcement_strategies**: Array of strategy objects with type, description, effectiveness, notes
- **incidents**: Array of incident objects (empty in this example)
- **checklist**: Object format with materials_ready, environment_prepared, reviewed_goals, notes

All fields are optional. The endpoint will save provided data and generate AI notes.
Minimal example with only activities and goals

item.name: Save Session - ABC Events with Time

request.description: Example showing ABC events with time field. Time format: "HH:MM:SS" or "HH:MM"
Checklist using object format with materials_ready, environment_prepared, reviewed_goals, etc.
Example with incidents. Incident types: sib, aggression, elopement, major_disruption, minor_disruption, odr, ir, crisis. Severity: low, moderate, high, critical.
